mapper.select: SELECT max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC001" THEN mc.method_code ELSE '' END) fairPrice , max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC002" THEN mc.method_code ELSE '' END) positionCost, max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC003" THEN mc.method_code ELSE null END) positionMarket, max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC004" THEN mc.method_code ELSE '' END) costPrice, max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC005" THEN mc.method_code ELSE '' END) floatingProfitLoss, max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC001" THEN m.method_name ELSE '' END) fairPriceName , max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC002" THEN m.method_name ELSE '' END) positionCostName, max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC003" THEN m.method_name ELSE null END) positionMarketName, max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC004" THEN m.method_name ELSE '' END) costPriceName, max(CASE mc.class_code WHEN "VC005" THEN m.method_name ELSE '' END) floatingProfitLossName FROM val_method_configure mc LEFT JOIN val_method m ON mc.method_code= m.method_code WHERE mc.fund_configure_id=#{fundConfigureId} LIMIT 1
